verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) -- President Donald Trump [V: has] signed an executive order to keep families together at the southern border , saying at the White House that he does n’t like the sight of children being separated from their families .

WASHINGTON ( AP ) -- [ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: signed] [ARG1: an executive order to keep families together at the southern border] , [ARGM-PRD: saying at the White House that he does n’t like the sight of children being separated from their families] .
